HeaderInfo.headerInfoHeader: Service for your car – easily and quickly
HeaderInfo.headerInfoText: Enter your location and license plate – you will immediately see your car's service information and can filter the search by service type or distance. Book an appointment online in just a few minutes.

headerInfoList.item2: Search filtering by location, service, and distance

electricVehicles.diagnosticsText: Electric vehicle service, repair and diagnostics
electricVehicles.batteryText: Electric vehicle battery service, repair, diagnostics and battery replacement

infoRegisterPlate.infoRegisterPlateText: Enter your license plate number so we can ensure your service booking is completed successfully.

infoForConfirmation.text: Check your reservation details before final confirmation. Make sure all information is correct. The reservation can be cancelled free of charge up to one day before the service. You can cancel your reservation through the confirmation link, even if the reservation has already been confirmed.

infoForNext.noPlateOrDate: Let's select a vehicle and the desired service date before proceeding to confirm the booking.
infoForNext.noDate: Let's select the desired service date.

contactInfo.title: Contact information
contactInfo.name: Name
contactInfo.marketingConsentDescription: I agree that the workshop may send me marketing communications, such as offers and news.
contactInfo.serviceConsent: I accept the terms of service

bookingConfirmation.title: Booking Confirmed
bookingConfirmation.confirmationText: Thank you for your booking! You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

bookingInfo.title: Instructions for bringing your car in for service

arrival.title: Arrival
arrival.info: Arrive on time (preferably in the morning, no later than 9:00 AM). Bring your service book (if you have one) and be prepared for possible additional work.

parking.title: Parking and preparation
parking.info: There is parking available for customers at the workshop. Park your car in the designated area.
parking.note: Inform the workshop of any faults or service requests.

checkIn.title: Check in at reception
checkIn.info: During opening hours: come inside to the counter, give your name and license plate number.
checkIn.note: Outside opening hours: use the key drop box.

confirmationAndContact.title: Confirmation and contact
confirmationAndContact.info: You will receive a confirmation by email. You can contact the workshop by phone or email if you have any questions.
confirmationAndContact.contactInfo: You can find the workshop's contact details in the booking confirmation.

payment.title: Payment
payment.info: Payment is made on site. You can pay by cash or card.
payment.note: Ask for a receipt for your payment.

bookingInfo.extra: Questions? Contact the workshop directly or send us a message.

footer.footerText: Huoltolaskuri.fi is a Finnish service that helps you find suitable maintenance for your car and book an appointment easily online.

error.serverError: Server error, please try again later
